statements: SELECT * FROM accounts
SELECT username, password FROM accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT user_id, password FROM accounts WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM accounts WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, password_hash FROM login_credentials WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN login_credentials ON users.user_id = login_credentials.user_id;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE password_hash = E'\x123456789abcdef';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS credential_count FROM login_credentials GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 2 AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 3;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time > '2021-01-01' AND logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT u.username, s.login_time, s.logout_time FROM users u JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions ORDER BY login_time ASC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 3 AND role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, login_time FROM sessions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, password, created_at FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true ORDER BY login_time DESC;
